website_summaries.verdict: If you prefer glass coffee mugs, this is the set to consider. Attractive design w/16 oz. capacity.
pros: An attractive, durable set of 6 glass mugs
We love the large size and curved shape
cons: Some mugs had noticeable defects such as lines and bubbles in the glass

customer_reviews.title: Not all they're cracked-up to be........
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love the mugs. They are nearly identical to a pair purchased at a big-box retailer and we were looking for more of them. However, it appears that we are only able to love 8 of the 12 purchased. The 4 mugs representing the the balance of the two orders cracked. One cracked while the Keurig was brewing coffee into it while the other three simply cracked while sitting on the counter shortly after brewing. It would also appear that they seem to crack in nearly identical locations, perhaps suggesting some flaw. Purchasing them is gambling. I would hope for a better than 25% survival rate.
customer_reviews.author: m hitch

customer_reviews.title: Be careful....might not want to use with hot liquid...
customer_reviews.text: I had similar mugs for years. I broke some, so I ordered these as replacement. Unfortunately my first glass, as soon as I poured hot water in it, it cracked! Attached are the pictures. Not safe. Update after using it for a while. They are made so cheap that the edges of each glass are so sharp you can cut yourself. Unfortunately I am throwing them out. Horrible.
customer_reviews.author: kasia350z

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy! Dangerous Product!
customer_reviews.text: I love the shape and look of these mugs, but that was before boiling water spilled all down my front. I poured myself a cup of tea and picked it up when the bottom of the cup cracked off. Luckily I was not burnt badly, but having boiling water dump down your leg is not very pleasant. Be careful if you do buy these, it’s not worth the risk in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: ~m~

customer_reviews.title: There is a seam running vertical on along Each glass ...
customer_reviews.text: There is a seam running vertical on along Each glass they crack and we have to throw Them out!!! We clean them in our dishwasher .They crack for some reason . We wash delicate wine glasses all the time never do they break!! Please do not purchase!! This is the second time I purchased these glass cups.Two strikes and your out!!!!
customer_reviews.author: allan cohen

customer_reviews.title: I loved them at first but then they started to crack, and then they exploded!!
customer_reviews.text: I've had these about a month. I loved them at first but then they started to crack. Very disappointed. Update: When the first one cracked I was disappointed, but the most recent one exploded when I poured water into it for tea. The water was understandably hot (it was for tea) but not ridiculously so. The glass however suddenly shattered, sending water all over my counter. I was fortunate that I was not burned. DO NOT GET THESE MUGS.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Great product, with a stupid sticker on each item
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, good quality glasses, so why a 1 star? Because they put a stupid sticker that refuses to go away on each one. A really ugly, stubborn, no freaking use sticker on each glass. Ruins the product completely. It is not just an annoyance, it makes the product totally worthless. I will change it to 5 stars if they stop putting the stickers on these glasses. Until then, this is not worth more than $2 a dozen. Seriously!
customer_reviews.author: manyvan2000

customer_reviews.title: Quality is very very poor and definitely will not order them again
customer_reviews.text: No I would never buy his product again. I am not sure if the product I got was defective or that’s how they are all. The mug have sharp uneven edges, you can actually can cut yourself while drinking. They are not even and have seams in them and some don’t. Even though the glass is thick I only have about 3 left out of a dozen or more I ordered. And I only had them for about 3 months. Quality is very very poor and definitely will not order them again. I wish they had some kind of warranty because that was waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the size and style of these mugs. Imagine my disappointment this am when I poured two mugs full of coffee from my coffee maker carafe, and both mugs immediately cracked, sending coffee all over my counter tops. I grabbed a third quickly and transferred the coffee in to it with same result. Really??? Aren’t these supposed to be cups for hot beverages??? They deserve zero stars.
customer_reviews.author: ID

customer_reviews.title: Patients is required!!
customer_reviews.text: Arrive on time and well packaged. Mugs are great and seem like they will be very durable. My only complaint is that in a box of 24 each and every one had a very sticky sticker on them which is impossible to remove in one piece. Even after soaking the glue from the sticker was still on them!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Smith

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality. Not recommended.
customer_reviews.text: We were really disappointed with the purchase (2 sets). Some of the glasses were chipped not sure if that happened during shipping or not. Some has the Anchor logo at the bottom of the glass some didn't. In addition, on some of them, the seams where they molded the glasses together are very pronounced and visible. The design looks nice and classy but quality is really poor, the imperfections are too visible. We are returning them.
customer_reviews.author: DaToe

customer_reviews.title: I would love these mugs if they didn't have a sharp seam ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a set of six of these. There is a seam going down the side of the glass. On three of the six mugs, this seam was sharp and uneven. You could cut your finger by running it down the seam. Shame on Anchor Hocking (USA made) for selling substandard mugs. I would love these mugs if they didn't have a sharp seam down the side. Anchor Hocking needs to improve on quality control.
customer_reviews.author: Morning Glory

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are heavy glasses, and look good, but are uncomfortable! The problem is the seam on the handle it not even. This problem makes them almost impossible to hold properly. Because of the weight, the seam feels like it is cutting into your finger! It is not just uncomfortable it is impossible to hold one-handed for more than a second or two. When I saw the Anchor Hocking name I didn't look any further, but I am a little disappointed! If the problem is addressed I would buy again. As a side note, they are packaged well a drop from 3 foot the six would survive unharmed I would think?
customer_reviews.author: Hank1946

customer_reviews.title: Good size; easy to hold; hard to tip, but retain too much water after washing in dishwasher
customer_reviews.text: Oct 28, 2019 I like the generous size of these mugs, that they resist tipping over by young grandchildren (or even their hasty grandma!), and that the handle is easy to hold. I do not like the large indentation in the bottom that holds almost an ounce of water after washing in the dishwasher. Yes: this is a minor flaw; but it's just one of those "life's little annoyances" that could easily have been avoided by a flat bottom. I don't see any purpose to the concave bottom.
customer_reviews.author: iloveamazon

customer_reviews.title: Fine Manufacturing Design
customer_reviews.text: I love well designed ordinary objects and these mugs are among the best. My first experience drinking from one was the way it felt on my lips. ts gentle curve was a natural fit. Speaking of "fitting", one of my hesitations in ordering the mugs was my lack of cupboard space. I was delighted to find that most of them are stack-able! And to top off this positive review, I just found out that a hair tie fits perfectly around the base eliminating a need for coasters! These mugs are more than a purchase, they are a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen F. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Best cup/mug for long run. NOT ANYMORE
customer_reviews.text: Holds 16 oz. So plenty big good to hold hands around in winter. I like clear glass as you can see liquid clearly. I make teas, coffee (home roasted), cacao. I've been using this item for over 30 years. The design has always been available. Not elegant, but very practical, Durable and a pleasure to use. Update*** I have been using these mugs for decades, but this last batch is terrible. Five out of six have broken while pouring water for tea. I do preheat the mugs and pour slowly, this breaking from hot water has never presented before. As much as I love the design, I can't afford this.
customer_reviews.author: Quick Smart

customer_reviews.title: This mug does NOT hold 14 ounces of liquid
customer_reviews.text: This glass mug is fine and seems pretty sturdy. But it definitely does not have a 14 ounce capacity. I would never have bought it as i have plenty of glass mugs that hold 12 ounces or less. I needed specifically a 14 ounce capacity. Really annoying to have incorrect product information
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth N.

customer_reviews.title: Heavy and decent looking - size is wrong
customer_reviews.text: These mugs are heavy and decent looking, but are not much better than "OK". They have a very noticeable seam running down the side and their advertised capacity is off. Mine measure closer to 15 ounces than 16. So, they are OK but not great. If you can get them on sale they are about $4 a mug, which is not bad. again, they are heavy and look nice for lattes or tea, I had hoped they'd be better, especially advertised as an American made product.
customer_reviews.author: B. Colonna

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous!
customer_reviews.text: Danger! Glass cracked when I put liquid in it for the first time!! Not even hot liquid- just warm! This items I dangerous, what if my child was holding this? Liquid went everywhere. Believe the reviews- there are seams on the glasses which is weird but then when you add liquid they crack. These need to be taken off amazon for safety. Someone could get hurt and possibly sue.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle G

customer_reviews.title: Slightly Changed. WHY?
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for me about 4 years ago and can lick them to death. So I ordered them again as a Christmas gift. I just visited my family and saw my gift up close. I was disappointed. The bottom had a matte finish causing the drink not to look so clear. And one of the cups felt chipped at the top just above the handle. It wasn't chipped, however. If felt like a pointed, sharp flaw. Please classic Anchor Hocking, don't go away.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne

customer_reviews.title: Reading other Reviews is Hilarious
customer_reviews.text: thank you for making this classic for decades. YES. they break. Especially if your mama did not teach you to put a spoon in the glass when adding boiling water, Basic mama 101. Yes it has a seam on the back side. These are not leaded hand cut crystal. They are mass produced glass mugs. They last decades, but some do break along the way like glass is apt to do. LOVE this classic. Now back to reading the wacko one star comments, just for laughs. And guess what. They jacked up the price. LOL
customer_reviews.author: Johannes

customer_reviews.title: Look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.text: Had these mugs a little over a month now. One arrived with a chip around the rim. Okay, not a huge deal. It happens. Within the last month, three of the mugs have shattered in my hand while pouring coffee in them. Mind you, these were room temp glasses at and ambient 65° or so. Suicidal glassware aside, they dont hold heat well. The do look nice when they dont arrive chipped, and they're easy to clean. Overall I would not reccomend unless you enjoy coffee burns on your feet at 4am.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: It got here in one piece and the mugs are GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: Generic version of Princess House coffee mugs, my mother wondered what she would do if hers ever broke. I found these and surprised her, she LOVED it. Best coffee mugs ever, and great price! Arrived alive! Princess House was 149.99$ for set of 6. This was <20$ shipped for set of 6 (with Prime). One very very very happy retired mother = priceless. AWESOME! The mower blew up 7~8 days later and she doesn't even CARE (not my fault anyways).
customer_reviews.author: Will D.

customer_reviews.title: Even nicer than a few years ago!
customer_reviews.text: First of all, these were packaged so well...that I "packaged my Christmas glasses" in the same box! And it was a box within a box - super packaging, and the boxes were clean as well!! Second, over other brands, we have been fans of Anchor Hocking for years. We have had this set of coffee mugs for years...this order...more comfortable handle...so we were thrilled - the base is just a tad "shorter" which actually is better suited for the balance...all the way around, these are winners, and not expensive either! They look EXACTLY like the photo - highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: lam

customer_reviews.title: I am very disappointed in the cups I bought them because I thought ...
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed in the cups I bought them because I thought it would be safe for tea and hhot chocolate but I was wrong the cup just exploded with the hot water in it I have bought 12 cuos and now am afraid to use them I always like anchor hocking but will not buy them again we were lucky not to get burned for the hot water I have never heard that you could not make tea in a coffee cuo
customer_reviews.author: bt

customer_reviews.title: I bought them because they are anchor hocking which i thought was a good quality and made in the usa
customer_reviews.text: These are called coffee cups. I bought them because they are anchor hocking which i thought was a good quality and made in the usa. I cleaned them and went to pour coffee in and the whole cup cracked all the way around it! Coffee went everywhere. I am so disappointed in the quality of these cups. Aside from them cracking there is also a seem that runs up the side of each cup which feels sharp and you would not want to put your lips on for sure! Very sad
customer_reviews.author: Walter Butler

customer_reviews.title: Awesome mugs!
customer_reviews.text: They did have rough spots right out of the box - so bad that I thought only three of the six cups were usable - but after a couple weeks of use, they're all smoothed out and nice! Every visitor we've had since getting these cups has commented on them. They look like hot toddy mugs and there's just something special about them. We drink three times as much hot chocolate as we used to, just because using these mugs feels so nice, especially around the holidays. Definitely recommended! And give them a few runs through the dishwasher if they come out of the box feeling rough or sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Liz L.

customer_reviews.title: Exploding Mug
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these mugs to match an existing set (purchased from retail store). I wanted so much to like these mugs but they had a seam from the rim to bottom that cut my son's hand while washing (seam is not smooth). As the picture shows, the mug exploded as I was filling it under the hot water boiler and cracking up into 4 pieces and water everywhere. Since this is the second mug to explode, I felt I must let others know. Good thing the pieces did not fly.
customer_reviews.author: Delilah

customer_reviews.title: They crack!
customer_reviews.text: These appear to be nice glasses. But they keep cracking. I've barely had them a week and three cracked leaking hot coffee on me and my wife.
customer_reviews.author: Slim Whitman

customer_reviews.title: Love These Mugs!
customer_reviews.text: I had a couple I purchased from Walmart and needed to replace because one broke. I was able to order a case with 6 and was so happy. They are great for either hot or cold drinks and dishwasher safe! And, while I can't swear to it, they seems far more resistant to staining or etching from tea, which was a problem with my normal, "tall" cold drink glasses, so I went to all mugs! Thanks, Anchor Hocking!
customer_reviews.author: Inphyniti

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: There is a sharp raised seam that runs down the side of the handle that makes them very uncomfortable to hold. That seam digs into my pinky finger. None of mine have broken like others have reported - yet. We can file down the sharp seams but *sheesh* we shouldn't have to, eh?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: greenish color
customer_reviews.text: the description is misleading, as this is not definitely "crystal glass". It has a green hue to it and you can see the line from the mold, not smooth. Overall, you can find better products with same range of price.
customer_reviews.author: shawn baker

customer_reviews.title: Anchor Hocking Clear Glass Coffee Mugs
customer_reviews.text: The coffee mugs are just okay, they look like seconds, the bottoms are not smooth like the other glass mugs I have purchased in the past and the weight isn't the same as what I have used. I don't know if they are going to hold up, and I will give an update after using them. Update: I have returned these, they were chipped on the rim and on the bottom, the mug is not one continous piece and the glass is rough.
customer_reviews.author: Chloe

customer_reviews.title: Glass Mugs are Great and Versatile!
customer_reviews.text: Anchor is a fine old maker of glass products. Same quality evident with these mugs. I bought these mugs to make hot tea. They work well for iced tea and coffee also. Orange juice too. No issues with breaking glass . Two mugs stack nicely for storage. Seeing through the glass is very nice for many drinks! Keep the beverages hot or cold. Easy to hold if you have issues with your hands. These glass mugs match everything and look nice with patterned dishes, etc. Very versatile! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: lovedogs

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Mug
customer_reviews.text: Poor Quality! I opened the box and saw one of them have cracks on it. I thought it is maybe a mistake and the others may not have any issue. However, all of the others were not in a good shape.The glass is not clear and uniform and doesn't look good at all! The edges are also uneven! I got so much disappointed and did not even use it for once and decided to return!
customer_reviews.author: Mohsen

customer_reviews.title: Great for Lattes
customer_reviews.text: When I bought my Keurig K-Cafe I needed a cup that would work well for the Lattes it produced. I bought these glass coffee mugs for that purpose and they are the perfect choice. Easy to hold and large enough to hold the latte and foamed milk they are the perfect size. They are also a very attractive way to serve the coffee drinks. They are not expensive and hold up well to hand washing or in the dish washer. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Lou

customer_reviews.title: Good cups
customer_reviews.text: I love these cups / mugs! Large, easy to hold and really nice. I only have one problem. The new ones I just ordered arrived today and one of them has a chip in it. I don't want to return all six of these because one is damaged, and I can't figure out how to contact Amazon to let them know. Carton was undamaged. Cups were well packed. I don't know how this one got chipped.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: These cups are perfect for me, just the right size (not too big, not too tall, and not too heavy), sturdy clear glass. I wasn't planning on ordering so many but they were not offered in lesser quantities (I tried the ones offered in smaller batches and they were too big, tall and heavy so I exchanged). The price was right and I don't regret having the extras, sooner or later I will need them and use them.
customer_reviews.author: Betty T. Valls

customer_reviews.title: A great find!
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased two of these mugs years ago and loved them. Unfortunately the last remaining one broke earlier this year. Since going to a store is out, I was so glad to find these at Amazon. Took a little while to get them and I have already broken one, but delighted to still have five. Great price and nice mugs.
customer_reviews.author: road writer

customer_reviews.title: Cracked when used with hot water for tea
customer_reviews.text: I loved the cups for tea -- could tell when the tea is brewed. BUT, I put my teabag in one cup this morning, poured in the hot water and it cracked/split spilling hot water all over the counter. Thank heavens it didn't happen when I picked it up!!!! I simply don't trust these cups now for my coffee or tea. sad, because they are nice.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Stiers

customer_reviews.title: amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I love ANCHOR HOCKING SO MUCH!!! As a young latino gay, we are so loyal to brands my manager recommended me this brand. I started with their mixing bowls, now glass cups, and now mugs! It just lasts! You won't regret it! I bought this for my "mom" for her birthday. She has a lot of company over and she loves to pull these out for coffee. Its so classy. I had to buy her a second set because she has one for display and one for use. NEXT IM BUYING HER THOSE LARGE JARS!
customer_reviews.author: Tony G.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: My daughter got similar mugs like these for a wedding present from Crate and Barrel and my husband loved the size and the fact it is clear glass. I later bought two at Publix grocery store and they seemed to stop carrying them because one broke and I wanted to order more. These arrived on time, just fine; however, the seam on the handle is quite rough, even sharp, and while my husband does not mind, I do not care for them at all. He is using them because I didn't have the energy to repack and return but I wish the seam was not so sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Susan S.

customer_reviews.title: These glasses are superior
customer_reviews.text: They are cute and classy and can be used for almost any beverage from water to coffee to beer and everything in between. They look great too!! I bought 4 from meijer and fell in love immediately. So glad I found them here in Amazon these will be a staple in my home for many years I am sure of it
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Good cups, bad packaging
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with the quality of the cups. However, 3 out of 12 were completely shattered when I received them. They are not wrapped into any material. It's a wonder the rest of them survived. Still a good price even for the 9. Also, the labels that they stick on the cup are very annoying to get rid of. After pealing them off, use alcohol swabs to remove the glue.
customer_reviews.author: Shorik

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, nice size
customer_reviews.text: Nice size and they were pretty after I washed them, as they came in an all-brown cardboard box which was very dusty inside, so the cups were very dusty. They also had some sharp edges that I had to sand down a bit, but all-in-all they seem to be sturdy and are perfect if you want to change over to glass cups.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma H

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and practical!
customer_reviews.text: There is absolutely nothing to dislike about these coffee cups! My sister and I were on vacation in Rodanthe and the house where we were staying had these mugs. We loved using them and loved the way they look Once we to home I ordered a set for myself and one for my sister. These are the best mugs, nice big handles and my husband loves them too. Anchor Hocking makes quality merchandise that lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Great mugs, but inspect as soon as you get them for chips before return window closes.
customer_reviews.text: Great mugs, please check them as soon as you get them. I purchased for gifts for an event I'm hoisting and didn't open them right away and noticed 1 mug has 2 huge chips on the rim. But these are nice mugs, sturdy, make great gifts, I also included a long tea spoon and some herbal teas.
customer_reviews.author: Latrice D.

customer_reviews.title: My favorite coffee cups ever.
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite coffee cups. I've bought them a couple of times because my husband loves them so much he leaves the house with them when he visits our relatives that live very close by. Our relatives, who now all have full sets, also love them. I've never had one break or chip, only disappear.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer E.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: 3 of them was broken as soon as I pour tea (boiling water) in it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keep looking
customer_reviews.text: Three of the six have sharp seams and subtle chipping, but there were no loose glass chips in the box. The quality control for these is non-existent. They had to have been placed in the box already damaged. All have noticable seams, which is not be a problem for us but should be noted. I've sanded the damaged cups so that they are usable without cutting anyone, but I should not have needed to. I just figured that any replacement cups would be of the same questionable quality.
customer_reviews.author: Cordially_Cherry

customer_reviews.title: Bottoms up!
customer_reviews.text: Well these glasses are just a tad smaller than my previous ones, they certainly worked perfectly for some Irish coffees! If I had any complaint, it would be that when you turn them upside down in the dishwasher the bottom part holds quite a bit of water so a flatter base would be an improvement. Otherwise who cares what liquid is on the bottom as long as the good liquid is in the top! :-) Cheers!
customer_reviews.author: Emma Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this product!
customer_reviews.text: Every glass was individually wrapped in bubble wrap in box that was way too large and EVERY SINGLE GLASS WAS SHATTERED upon arrival. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cracked while brewing coffee
customer_reviews.text: One of the mugs cracked as I was brewing coffee in the ninja coffee machine. Two days later another mug cracked as i was heating water up in the microwave to make tea.
customer_reviews.author: JRP

customer_reviews.title: so I was not a happy camper. I didn't have the time or patience ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered three packages of these beverage sets. One package contained 5 that had sharp edges and some defective spots, so I was not a happy camper. I didn't have the time or patience to waste my money to ship them back. The glass manufacturer dropped the ball on this one, not Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Monique N.

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made crap
customer_reviews.text: Breaks very easily while washing, the lip of cup has werid dips in it so you can only drink from one side . Would never ever ever ever purchase again, only have two left don’t clink together for a toast it will break . Don’t let it touch other dishes it will break and do not put in dishwasher it will break
customer_reviews.author: Renee T. Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE!
customer_reviews.text: At first I loved these coffee mugs, but a couple months in and one cracked and another chipped in the dishwasher, so I was down to 4. This morning, I poured hot water in one of them and squeezed some lemon in it, turned around to tidy up a couple things, and when I went to pick up the mug it cracked under pressure and sliced off a huge chunk of my thumb and sent hot water running down my legs and burning me. I threw the rest of them away and will never buy this product/brand again. I ignored previous reviews I saw on here and wish I hadn't.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis K. Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Had to replace my favorite mug after ten plus years
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite mugs. Just know that you cannot go from boiling water in it to plunging it into a cool dishpan. There is a seam. But with thoughtful care, they should last for years. I like that they are heavy and won't tip or spill.
customer_reviews.author: Rehabannie

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I went to a coffee house and they had these great glass mugs so I wanted them for home to enjoy my coffee. These were exactly the same as the ones in the coffee house! I enjoy my morning coffee even more out of these glass mugs :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this mug style so I gave it a shot
customer_reviews.text: I just love the style of these glass mugs! They were received within its specified delivery time. I am very happy with this purchase. The only reason I don't give 5 stars is because there is one minor flaw in one mug. There is a black spot of something close to the base and it will NOT come off. Almost as it were fired into the glass. Even with the mixed reviews I recommend giving this item and it's company a chance. As long as you have PRIME and free returns it is definitely worth a shot. All of my mugs were packed well enough and intact upon delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Rayanne Sheahan

customer_reviews.title: An OK mug that might be just what you need
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mug to use with my Hario drip coffee cone. Since I only make one cup at a time, I wanted a clear mug to ensure I didn't over fill the mug. This accomplishes that goal well. The mug is well made and will definitely last a long time. The are numerous cosmetic defects from the manufacturing process such as glass that isn't smooth and definitely isn't optically clear. Perfectionists should look elsewhere, but if you just need a basic mug to knock around in the office AND the clear material is something you need this mug will meet your needs.
customer_reviews.author: Kensingtonian

customer_reviews.title: Six years, no chips and still going strong!
customer_reviews.text: Love how nespresso coffee looks in these mugs. These mugs are substantial, comfortable to drink from and easy to care for. They look great right out of the dishwasher. Someone else mentioned the small amount of water that collects on the base during the cleaning cycle, which is a small inconvenience. These are reasonably priced, long lasting, sturdy mugs that are perfect for hot drinks.
customer_reviews.author: JT Wales

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, small but they work great.
customer_reviews.text: I got these for a dinner party I was having they are beautiful but are not as large as I thought I misread the description. Other than having to refill the cups with tea or coffee they worked beautifully. I am glad that I do have them and will use them again. But now I will have a better idea of how to host a luncheon.
customer_reviews.author: ReB

customer_reviews.title: Nice cups; be careful of broken ones
customer_reviews.text: Two of the glasses were cracked/chipped, and there were no broken pieces in the box, which implies that they were packaged broken. I don't want to send the case back, since I need them for something, but I paid for twelve glasses and only have ten that I can use. The glasses are a really good size, and they seem sturdy, though.
customer_reviews.author: Eknight

customer_reviews.title: Fun glasses
customer_reviews.text: These are fun larger sized glasses. They remind me of what drinks would come in at Harry Potter world. Nice room for ice and drink and have a nice look to them. I chose them because they are supposed to be one of the safest glass quality brand and made in the USA
customer_reviews.author: Felicity

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, and made in AMERICA
customer_reviews.text: Finally something made in AMERICA!!! Great product, arrived on time and I couldn’t be happier! Support made in America especially when it’s an awesome product! I already ordered a second set of 6 as a gift!
customer_reviews.author: Guy Levy

customer_reviews.title: ... was really excited to get this because they look nice and the first couple of uses I was happy
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to get this because they look nice and the first couple of uses I was happy. However, I just pulled one out of the dishwasher and sliced my finger because a small piece of the bottom had broken off. The bottom obviously was facing up in the dishwasher and nothing was leaning against it, so I don't know how it ended up breaking and it makes me concerned about using and washing the others. It's too bad because I had high hopes for these.
customer_reviews.author: Jill R

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL WELL MADE IN USA!!!
customer_reviews.text: GREAT mugs!! I love they are made in USA!!! Beautiful design. Easy to hold. I use them every single day with no problems. No rough edges anywhere on these mugs!! Never had any problems with them! Would make a great gift. I love them!!
customer_reviews.author: Diane R

customer_reviews.title: The price is right.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these for years. I like clear glass, and I also trust Anchor Hocking glass products. However, my sister keeps taking them and forgetting to bring them back, so I had to order more. Also, the price is right.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a set of 12
customer_reviews.text: If you occasionally have a group over for hot chocolate, Irish coffee, or Hot Buttered Rum, it's great to have a set of matching mugs. This set of 12 is a good value for the money and they are just the right size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: LOVE. My boyfriend and I got these as a gift from his parents for Xmas; she got them at TJ Maxx, and I just had to get more. Of course Amazon had them! They fit a large cup of coffee from a Keurig perfectly, leaving room even after creamer and sugar are added.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Thick Solid Feel and Easy to Grab
customer_reviews.text: It’s American Made and beats Ceramic for cleaning, no stains, grip and maintaining heat. So good, I’m buying more of their products and waiting delivery. Will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Pam K

customer_reviews.title: chipped and broken
customer_reviews.text: I've used these mugs for years and over time they break, which is fine. They are the best size and shape for our purposes. So, I ordered a couple of new sets and they are not the same quality as I've purchased before. These started chipping and cracking with first use. They are also chipping with sharp edges, which was not true of the older set. One of these chips cut my mother's finger. Either Anchor's quality has deteriorated badly over the past two years or these are poor imitations. Sorely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: ARRIVED BROKEN AND CHIPPED
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty, heavy glasses. Exactly what I had expected, however, upon arrival one arrived chipped on the rim and the other cracked along the side. There was no broken glass in the box upon arrival so I can only assume this was a production issue at the manufacturing plant. Hopefully the seller and I can rectify the issue and will update my review accordingly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect as gifts!!
customer_reviews.text: The mugs I purchased were gifts given to guests attending my daughters dinner party. They were etched with the name and date of the event. They were perfect for the occasion. They’re strong yet, elegant and functional. I would recommend them and/or buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia P. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Easily chips and breaks!
customer_reviews.text: 2 of the cups’ edges chipped after one simple use/wash (1 might have even arrived slightly chipped in the package). The chips further broke and made the mugs useless. Waste of money. Thy are heavy; so, I’m surprised they broke so easily.
customer_reviews.author: BE

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: About a minute in the microwave with the liquid button selected and it already cracked. I orginally got these from WalMart for a dollar. Those we're better than these, unfortunately
customer_reviews.author: Stickie

customer_reviews.title: Very poorly made
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two sets of these December 2017 and they are all broken except for two as of now. They looked very flawed when I received them but decided to keep them because I thought that they were defected and sold cheaper for that reason. The mugs leaned to one side and they cracked when pouring coffee in them. They had bubbles in the glass as well. Very poor quality and I really needed this size mug. Now I'm in the process of looking for more since I only have two mugs left.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Dissatisfied!!
customer_reviews.text: Not pleased with this product. It’s the second order I have placed and find that two of the mugs are chipped at the rim. Same with the first order. I was fortunate enough not to swallow chips of glass or cut my lips while drinking from it. This product should be carefully inspected before shipping. I am very dissatisfied with both orders.
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda Tomlinson

customer_reviews.title: Cup with a Crooked Lip.
customer_reviews.text: No kidding I just started to use my cups when I discovered one cup had a "dip" in it. I should attach a pic but at this point, I have had it. Quality control is not a value to Amazon based on its sellers.
customer_reviews.author: GIGI101

customer_reviews.title: I love these
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these and swapped out all my mugs that did not have a mate anymore and ordered this set. Love these. I love the look and the heft to these. They are easy to clean and just look nice overall. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amy C

customer_reviews.title: They crack when filled with hot water.  Beware of seams.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had these for a couple of months. They all had a seam down the side. I didn’t think much of it, I liked them, so I used them. One of the glasses cracked apart at the seam shortly after putting hot water in it. Then today, another glass cracked at the top, splitting all the way down when filled with hot water.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: All Cups Defective! Beware!
customer_reviews.text: All 6 cups are defective. Five have flaws so bad in the glass around the base that would easily cut someone. I have an old set of these and, while they're not great quality, they were usable. I like the size and shape of the mugs but these are unexceptable.
customer_reviews.author: ciagins

customer_reviews.title: A couple of glasses had defects.
customer_reviews.text: I have used these glasses from Anchor Hocking for over 15 years. Very disappointed when I had to throw 2 of them out due to defect of not sitting evenly. I'd like to have them replaced.
customer_reviews.author: DAC

customer_reviews.title: Good volume
customer_reviews.text: Not so good in the dishwasher as the bottom is cupped as well so they are full of dirty water every time you pull them from the dishwasher. Otherwise fine.
customer_reviews.author: Lars

customer_reviews.title: Glass is not durable!  Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: These glasses look nice but are not durable. Within 2 weeks, 3 of them were already chipped. Very disappointed as I always had good impression of the durability of my other Anchor Hocking glass wares.
customer_reviews.author: Pam T

customer_reviews.title: Not cosmetically perfect.  Shattered while making tea
customer_reviews.text: These are the clear, strong glasses I expected. I had not thought about how the base would turn into a well to collect water in the dishwasher. But that is not why I removed a star. They have what look like cracks or stray glass in various places (by handle or base, for example). UPDATE: I was quite surprised to be making a cup of tea (as I often did, with hot water poured in, not from a microwave) and have one of the glasses with no visible imperfections crack and spill very hot water all over my counter. Not happy. 4 stars to 2.
customer_reviews.author: lacedkat

customer_reviews.title: Stay away, glass cracks when you pour coffee in it....What good is a "Cafe Mug" that you can't pour coffee in??
customer_reviews.text: These looked ok out of the box, I didn't notice any severe handle seam as others have noticed. But within the first week, 2 out of 6 have already cracked and broken when pouring hot coffee in them. Very poor quality glass. Im so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: M. Luns

customer_reviews.title: A fantastic product - Five stars
customer_reviews.text: I love to use glass mugs, but it is extremely hard to find LARGE and DURABLE glass mugs out in the shoppes. Honestly, I have almost never come across large, durable, and reasonably priced glass mugs in the shoppes. These 16-ounce mugs are perfect for what I was looking for. They are large, durable, and easy to clean, and despite what some reviews have said, there is nothing about them that is uncomfortable while holding them. I highly recommend these mugs, if you're looking to use and own a set of large glass mugs. And they are very reasonably priced on top of all of that. Five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Love these mugs
customer_reviews.text: Love these mugs! Have bought them before. They look nice and protect table tops from the hot beverage because of the pedestal. Would give 5 stars, except that they chip easily around the pedestal. This order arrived with one mug chipped at the top rim - but Amazon made good on it. LOVE Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Great size, good quality, somewhat easy to chip
customer_reviews.text: I love these mugs. I have chipped a few but just bought replacements. The base makes it so that coasters are not so important, almost like it has a built in coaster. The handles are great for large hands and I like seeing what I'm drinking. The size is great for my Keurig and the volume allows full use of my Keurigs versatility.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Anchor Hocking Cafe Mug Beverage Set, 16-Ounce - set of 6
customer_reviews.text: Wonderfully large coffee mugs! These work extremely well with the Nespresso Vertuoline coffee machines for making lattes. Starbucks used to carry these mugs with their logo, but I have not been able to find them. They were around $12 - $15 from starbucks per mug, so these were a steal from Amazon. Found them at a local shop for $20 a piece! Yikes. Nice heavy glass, no seam lines (as I have seen on Chinese made ones), and feel great in your hand.
customer_reviews.author: J. Sayson

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I had two similar mugs for a long time and my wife managed to crack both of them within a month's time. These are perfect replacements they're pretty much all I use now.
customer_reviews.author: Floyd H. Shadwick

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't leave heat rings on surfaces
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I have used these types of mugs for over 10 years. We chose them because we were concerned about the lead content in coffee mugs and these are clear glass. An added bonus was that, once one pours hot liquid into them, the base does not heat up--so no rings on our wood surfaces if a coaster isn't used.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Not thrilled. Not only where they broken they arrived, after one wash in a dishwasher they crack. The coffee doesn't stay warm at all. Had to put in the microwave just after a few minutes
customer_reviews.author: Krd0880

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty and beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: These are heavy duty and beautiful mugs! The only complaint I would have is the glass around the rim and the base is uneven but not real noticable. This was not with all 6 mugs, only a couple. They are otherwise just as described and have a beautiful look to them and are heavy. We love them!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Great Glasses
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for Affogato Wednesdays at my work. Only issue is that one mug was packaged with a big chip around the mouthpiece. This happened prior to packaging, since there is no extra glass piece floating around in the box. Still looking to get this one replaced. Other than that, great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty AND practical for hot & cold drinks!
customer_reviews.text: Lovely large mugs that are practical for both hot and cold drinks! Am thinking of ordering more, because they aren’t the least bit easy to knock over like our glasses are!
customer_reviews.author: Earth Mama

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, classy looking mugs.
customer_reviews.text: Super impressed none of these came broken or chipped. The packaging was minimal, no fragile wording on the box or anything like that, tiny cardboard pieces that separated them but that was it. No other protection and NONE of them were broken. They are awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Carey1712

customer_reviews.title: Anchor Hocking Café Glass Coffee Mugs, 16 oz (Set of 6
customer_reviews.text: I received my set of 6 mugs today and opened it to find 2 of the 6 mugs had a sharp, jagged edge. I called Anchor Hocking and explained the situation, she promised they would send me two replacement mugs I will update my review when/if they arrive. My only options offered online was to send back the entire order at my own expense or request a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: All my other cups/plates/mugs are glass or delicate and nothing manages to break quite like tapping the rim of one of these mugs
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. 4 of the 6 are already broken because they are put together with thing seams that are jagged. The rims break the easiest. And I don't throw them around either. All my other cups/plates/mugs are glass or delicate and nothing manages to break quite like tapping the rim of one of these mugs.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Love these glasses
customer_reviews.text: I love these mugs because they're elevated and don't require a coaster to prevent burns to your desk or table top. Sadly mine arrived with two damaged. I suppose that's more the shipper's fault, but it would have been nice if the product had been carefully packaged first.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

product_meta.title: Anchor Hocking 16-oz Café Glass Coffee Mugs, Clear, Set of 6
product_meta.description: Size:16 oz (Set of 6)Anchor Hocking Cafe Mug set contains (6) 16-ounce glass mugs. Anchor Glass beverageware mug features a thick handle and footed base to help prevent spills and withstand daily use. Oversized capacity makes it perfect for any hot or cold beverage. Glasses are dishwasher safe. Curl up with a mug of cocoa in Anchor's most popular mug! The classically shaped glass cafe mug holds your favorite beverage from coffee and tea to spiced cider and more! This set is perfect for registries, new homeowners and holidays. Anchor Glass is MADE IN THE USA.
feature_bullets: INCLUDES: This Anchor Hocking set of coffee mugs comes with (6) 16-ounce glass mugs. All clear with an oversized handle - the ideal glass for hot beverages.
DURABLE: This set of coffee mugs is fit for any meal or setting. Its weighted design was engineered to prevent spills while its clean, modern shape keeps it always in style.
SAFE: Anchor Hocking glass is healthier than plastic and metal. It will not warp, stain, retain smells, or leach chemicals into drinks and beverages.
USE: These mugs make perfect wedding gifts, holiday gifts, and birthday gifts. Made for all manner of coffee, tea, and more.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars2,607 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
